short_definition: A judicial proceeding in which one party seeks to nullify a void or voidable marriage. A voidable marriage is valid until annulled, while a void marriage never was a valid marriage.
long_definition_html: A judicial proceeding in which one party seeks to nullify a void or voidable marriage. A voidable marriage is valid until annulled, while a void marriage never was a valid marriage.
